General.Name: Qingdao TGOOD Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao TGOOD Electric Co., Ltd. provides the electrical transmission and distribution solutions in China and internationally. The company offers kiosks, trailer, modular, and skip substations; electrical components, including HV gas insulated, HV hybrid gas insulated, and medium voltage switchgears; and transformers, such as dry type, oil filled, and amorphous alloy core transformers. It serves mining, oil and gas, railway, utilities, and renewables industries. Qingdao TGOOD Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.
